tool_description: German Gas Prices by the MTS-K Database
name: Gas Price Germany
title: Gas Price Germany

api_list.name: gas price
api_list.description: Current gas price for a location

api_list.name: ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gas-price-germany.p.rapidapi.com/core.ping.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gas-price-germany.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gas-price-germany.p.rapidapi.com/core.ping.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gas-price-germany.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
